Commitment and expertise are the most important factors he is looking for in a judge, because they will have to work with the finalists five or six days a week throughout the competition. I would rather be someone the president calls on from time to time for personal advice, without me expecting anything in return or asking for a position, Colin Powell said. On Afghanistan, Colin Powell said the 30,000 additional U.S. troops Barack Obama authorized in December 2009 haven't turned the war decisively yet. The last of the additional troops arrived in October.
